FlowDefinition.description:
For work orders submitted by the work order formassembly form. If prod cat = Corrugated, it will populate the owner and the servicing division. If not, it will populate the servicing division.
Edit 7/19 to fix decision logic Edit 7/19 to remove Courrgated Specialist null check Edit 7/20 to replace default outcome with decision path Edit 10/31 to set the WO to assigned Edit 9/10/19 Removed the filter criteria for WO records on the Update Record action 'Update WO with Owner and Division' Update Record action where MLA__c was NOT EQUAL to 'Yes
